58ca773b44b4b.Name: LLP011 List adddresses to select from
58ca773b44b4b.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search_after},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))>5
AND postcode != ''
ORDER BY CAST(pao AS SIGNED),sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 300"}

58ca6c233f02c.Name: LLP015 Selected value to fields
58ca6c233f02c.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select
	sao as flat_out,
	pao as house_out,
	street_name as street_out,
	town_name as town_out, 
	postcode as postcode_out5,
	uprn as uprn_out,
	lng as lng_out,
	lat as lat_out,
	{Choose_Address} as uprn_selected
FROM 
	llpgcache
WHERE 
	uprn = {Choose_Address}"}

58ca9f8575eb5.Name: PRO010 Load Profile info to SFG Cust Details
58ca9f8575eb5.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select * From
(select
	1 as IDZZ,
	1 as existSelected,
	1 as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	{flat} as flat_out,
	{house} as house_out,
	{street} as street_out,
	{town} as town_out, 
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom','',{postcode}) as postcode_out5,
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom',{postcode},'') as zIPPostcode,
	{country} as country_out,
	{country_id} as sel_country,
	{uprn} as uprn_out,
	{lng} as lng_out,
	{lat} as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAi' as haveRun
union select
	2 as IDZZ,
	'' as existSelected,
	'' as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	'' as flat_out,
	'' as house_out,
	'' as street_out,
	'' as town_out, 
	'' as postcode_out5,
	'' as zIPPostcode,
	'' as country_out,
	'' as sel_country,
	'' as uprn_out,
	'' as lng_out,
	'' as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAe' as haveRun) Combine
Where
	IDZZ = (select if({subParm} like '%dA%' 
			and {subParm} not like '%oNA%'
			and {postcode} is not null ,1,2) as test)"}

58cac46f269a2.Name: LLP017 Change to Use Customer Recorded
58cac46f269a2.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {flat}, '') as flat_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {house}, '') as house_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {street}, '') as street_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {town}, '') as town_out, 
	IF(({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%')
		and ({country} IS NULL or {country} = '' or {country} = 'United Kingdom')), {postcode}, '') as postcode_out5,
	IF(({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%')
		and ({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom')), {postcode}, '') as zIPPostcode,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {country}, '') as country_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {uprn}, '') as uprn_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {lng}, '') as lng_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {lat}, '') as lat_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), 1, '') as existSelected,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), 1, '') as existingCustomer,
 'ProcAi' as haveRun"}

58efbd46c0cbd.Name: LLP018 Confirm the entered address
58efbd46c0cbd.Output_template: {"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","query":"select a.*, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'Entered','') as uprn_selected, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'',1) as Address_Found, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'',concat(if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 < 3,'The address must contain a flat or house number, road and postcode. ',''),if(b.p4 = 1,' The postcode must contain a space, for e.g. "PO1 2AL"',''))) as confMsg, '' as confirmAddress, b.* from (select 123 as id, {flat_out1} as flat_out, {house_out1} as house_out, {street_out1} as street_out, {town_out1} as town_out, {postcode_out51} as postcode_out5, {zIPPostcode1} as zIPPostcode, {country_out1} as country_out, {sel_country} as country_id_out, '' as uprn_out, '' as lng_out, '' as lat_out, '' as existSelected, '' as existingCustomer) as a RIGHT JOIN (select if(c.p1 + c.p2 + c.p3 - c.p4 > 2,'123','321') as id, c.* from (select if({flat_out1} != '' or {house_out1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%',0,1)) as p1, if({street_out1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%',0,1)) as p2, if({postcode_out51} != '' or {zIPPostcode1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%' or {subParam} like '%mPo%',0,1)) as p3, if({postcode_out51} REGEXP '(((^[BEGLMNSbeglmns][1-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww][2-9])|(^([Aa][BLbl]|[Bb][ABDHLNRSTabnhlnrst]|[Cc][ABFHMORTVWabfhmortvw]|[Dd][ADEGHLNTYadeghlnty]|[Ee][HNXhnx]|[Ff][KYky]|[Gg][LUYluy]|[Hh][ADGPRSUXadgprsux]|[Ii][GMPVgmpv]|[JEje]|[Kk][ATWYatwy]|[Ll][ADELNSUadelnsu]|[Mm][EKLekl]|[Nn][EGNPRWegnprw]|O[LXlx]|[Pp][AEHLORaehlor]|[Rr][GHMghm]|[Ss][AEGKL-Paegkl-pRSTWYrstwy]|[Tt][ADFNQRSWadfnqrsw]|[Uu][Bb]|[Ww][ADFNRSVadfnrsv]|YO|ZE|yo|ze)[0-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww]1[A-Ha-hJKSTUWjkstuw0-9])|(((^[Ww][Cc][1-2])|(^[Ee][Cc][1-4])|(^[Ss][Ww]1))[ABEHMNPRVWXYabehmnprvwxy]))[_ ]([0-9][ABD-Habd-hJLNP-Ujlnp-uW-Zw-z]{2}))$|(^[Gg][Ii][Rr][_ ]0[Aa]{2})$',0,if({postcode_out51} != '',1,0)) as p4) as c) as b ON a.id = b.id","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

props.label: html 1
props.content:
Families and carers with children, and young people who have SEND can join our Short Breaks prepaid card scheme. The scheme provides short breaks, leisure and social opportunities to children and young people with SEND and allows carers some time away from their responsibilities.

You can use our Short Breaks Prepaid Card towards lots of activities including:

  • A variety of leisure activities
  • Equipment to help your child to access activities

Read a full list of activities in our application information booklet.

You can get a Short Breaks Prepaid Card if you live in Portsmouth, your child is of school age, is under 18 and either attends:

  • a special school for children and young people with SEND.
  • a mainstream school/college/post 16 provision and has an Education, Health and Care Plan that specifies full time support (the funding allocated as part of the plan is equivalent to 25 hours or more support in school or 16 hours or more support in college)

If you are unsure whether your child is eligible, contact the Short Breaks Officer:

Tel: 023 9268 8842

Read the Application Information Booklet before completing this form.

How we will use your information:

We will only use the information you give us to contact you about targeted short breaks.

We do not share information about our pupils with anyone without consent, unless the law allows us to do so. Read the Councilâ€™s Privacy Notice for more details.

If you are eligible for our Short Breaks Prepaid Card we'll share your information with Prepaid Financial Services who provide the Prepaid Card Service. Read their Data Protection Privacy Policy for more details.

Your information may also be used to plan Short Break services to meet future demand and the needs of children and young people with disabilities. This information will be kept anonymous.

If you have any concerns regarding our privacy policy and how we collect and use your personal information, you can write to:

Data Protection Officer
Portsmouth City Council
Civic Offices
Portsmouth
PO1 2AL

props.label: html 3
props.content:
Parent / Carer Information

Please provide details for the individual who will act as the cardholder. The name of this person will appear on the card.

Information about the child / young person

Please complete information below for the child or young person who will be accessing this service. If you are applying for funding for multiple children, please use the 'add child / young person' button at the end of this page to add details of any additional children / young people.

props.label: html 6
props.content:
This declaration sets out the agreement regulating the use of pre-payment card between the nominated card holder (parent/carer) and Portsmouth City Council ("PCC").

  • I understand that my prepaid card is only loadable by Portsmouth City Council (PCC)
  • I agree to use the funds loaded on the prepaid card towards Short Breaks for my child.
  • I understand that I must not use my card to purchase items or activities that the local council has prohibited. This includes alcohol and tobacco, any illegal substances that may cause harm to myself or other people, gambling, debt repayment or any illegal activities.
  • I understand that I will keep and send in receipts for any money where the card is used in supermarkets and convenience stores.
  • I understand that PCC will seek to recover any monies where there is evidence that they have been misspent.
  • I understand that Portsmouth City Council will recover any money that is left on the card as of 31st March 2020.
  • I understand that I should treat my pre-paid card like cash. If it is lost or stolen, I may lose some or all of the money.
  • I understand that I must not let anyone use the prepaid card on my behalf.
  • If I lose my prepaid card or it is stolen, or if I suspect that my prepaid card has been used by someone other than myself, I will phone the lost and stolen card helpline on 020 7127 6982.
  • I understand that the information PCC will collect on each cardholder, is information about purchases made with the prepaid card, such as date of purchase, amount, payee details ("Cardholder Information").
  • I understand that the prepaid card is non-transferable, and it may be cancelled, repossessed or revoked at any time without prior notice subject to applicable law.
  • I understand that only PCC employees who need to perform their job responsibilities are authorised to have access to Cardholder information.
  • I understand that PCC may maintain physical, electronic and procedural security measures that comply with regulations to safeguard Cardholder information.
  • By activating my card I will be agreeing to Prepaid Financial Services Terms of Use, paper copies can be provided on request or can be found at prepaidfinancialservices.com/en/terms-and-conditions.
  • I agree to provide feedback to PCC on the difference the short breaks prepaid card has made for me, my child and my family.
  • I understand that I am responsible for the use of the prepaid card according to the terms of this agreement.
  • The prepaid card is not connected to any other account owned by me.
  • The information I have given on this form is complete and accurate. I understand that my personal information is held securely and will only be used for the Prepaid Card application and collection of statistical information.
  • By submitting this form you are consenting to your information being passed to agencies outside of Portsmouth City Council for the purpose of processing and managing your prepaid card.

props.maximumChoicesMessage: Please select no more than _max_value_ choices
props.label: declaration confirmed

listOfValues.label: I confirm I have read and agreed to the statements above

props.label: emailMain
props.defaultValue:
concat({#emailStart},'Dear ',{parentCarer/First_Name_out}, ' ', {parentCarer/Surname_out},',\n
\n
Thank you for submitting your application for the Short Breaks Prepaid Card. Your reference number is ', {reference}, '\n
\n
\n
We will now check whether you are eligible for a Short Breaks Prepaid card. If your application is successful we', {SQ}, 'll let you know the amount allocated. If you', {SQ}, 're not eligible we', {SQ}, 'll contact you about other targeted short breaks that might be available.\n
\n
\n
Yours sincerely,\n
Portsmouth City Council',{#emailEnd})
